optOut.waitForThenClick: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div:nth-child(1)#ensBannerDescription > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div#buttonMaster > button:nth-child(3)#bannerRejectButton

test.waitForVisible: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div:nth-child(1)#ensBannerDescription > div:nth-child(4):not([id]) > div#buttonMaster > button:nth-child(3)#bannerRejectButton
